programme.desc: Natalia Molina and other members of La Minka, a Chavista collective, run a revolutionary bakery in the Venezuelan capital. They have been occupying the shop in Caracas since March 2017 in an attempt to provide their local community with affordable food.

programme.title: The foreign domestic staff living a life of five-star | Isis has my kids
programme.desc: I was just a slave: the foreign domestic staff living a life of five-star serfdom in London | Isis has my kids: I won't stop till I get them home to the US

programme.title: The only way out is through Jesus: The El Salvador pastors saving MS-13 gang members
programme.desc: In El Salvador, where brutal gangs like MS-13 and 18th Street have given the country the world’s highest murder rate, the only way out for members is to become born-again Christians.

programme.title: The imams, the Taliban and the condom | The Black Panthers still in prison after 46 years
programme.desc: The imams, the Taliban and the condom | The Black Panthers still in prison after 46 years, will they ever be set free?

programme.title: Ireland's forgotten mixed-race child abuse victims
programme.desc: Rosemary Adaser was one of many mixed-race children considered illegitimate who was brought up in institutions run by the Catholic church in Ireland between the 1950s and 1970s.

programme.title: Buyers Club
programme.desc: In 2013, a cure was found for hepatitis C. It could save millions of lives, but its price tag of between $40,000 and $84,000 for 84 pills puts it far out of most patients’ reach.

programme.title: Emergency hotline for Syrian refugee | A Syrian refugee in Scotland
programme.desc: The 24-hour emergency hotline for Syrian refugee | A Syrian refugee in Scotland: 'I'm one of the lucky ones'

programme.title: The Mexican women who kicked out | Mumbai's all-female taxi firm | Veiled rapper breaking taboos
programme.desc: The Mexican women who kicked out the cartels | Drive for women's empowerment: Mumbai's all-female taxi firm | The veiled rapper breaking taboos for women in Senegal

programme.title: Wild cities: how can we make space for nature in urban areas?
programme.desc: As the coronavirus lockdown makes wildlife more visible in our cities, biodiversity reporter Patrick Greenfield speaks to ecologist Dr Rana El-Sabaawi and evolutionary biologist Prof Menno Schilthuizen.

programme.title: Canada's Music Cities
programme.desc: Canada's Music Cities

programme.title: Crossing the line
programme.desc: 10 Middle Eastern artists undertake a road trip across the US, exploring common concerns between the US and the Middle East. Made in collaboration with Culturunners.

programme.title: Fresh Voices
programme.desc: 'We wanted to reflect everything black women can be': authors of Slay in Your Lane | 'There was a lot of crying': youngest Booker prize nominee on writing her first novel

programme.title: Present traces
programme.desc: Asio Makes a Movie | Unnatural Deaths | The Skin of Others

programme.title: The Guardian Cities - The artist and their city
programme.desc: The artist and their city: Ai Weiwei on Beijing: 'It's a prison for freedom of speech' | Antony Gormley: 'London is bought, developed and abandoned'

programme.title: Death land
programme.desc: Hello, I have death anxiety | he death doula: helping you prepare for the day you die

programme.title: The Pegasus project
programme.desc: A special investigation into NSO Group, which sells hacking spyware to governments.

programme.title: What's it like to spar with Carl Froch? | It's my body of armour
programme.desc: What's it like to spar with Carl Froch? | It's my body of armour: my life as a female bodybuilder

programme.title: Desert Fire
programme.desc: Football’s world cup for unrecognised territories is viewed through the eyes of the manager and players of one of the most fascinating teams, Iraqi Kurdistan.

programme.title: America's soccer migrants: the US footballers crossing Mexico's border
programme.desc: Despite President Donald Trump’s rhetoric about Mexicans crossing the border to the US, American soccer players such as Omar Gonzalez are heading south for new opportunities, more money and a better standard of football.

programme.title: I fled Ukraine with my son | Refugees in Calais
programme.desc: I fled Ukraine with my son. Now we're going back home | Refugees in Calais: ‘house them like the Ukrainians’

programme.title: Scars
programme.desc: Scars are not just skin deep - emotional and psychological histories lie beneath the healed wounds.

programme.title: Why is big tobacco booming? | Campaign to reclaim children's play space on British streets
programme.desc: We're quitting smoking, so why is big tobacco booming? | Kids v cars: the campaign to reclaim children's play space on British streets

programme.title: Fight or flight: the veterans at war with PTSD
programme.desc: One hundred years on from the end of the first world war, a group of veterans in Dorset are torn between their pride in their military careers and their anger over the lack of psychological support provided to them by the Ministry of Defence.

programme.title: Chalk Girl
programme.desc: Chalk Girl: a protester at the heart of Hong Kong’s democracy movement. Two years since her arrest made her an accidental infamous hero of the pro-democracy umbrella movement, the 16-year-old must decide whether to rejoin the battle alongside the 'localist' youth.

programme.title: From the Bronx to Yale: the power of high school 'speech'
programme.desc: High school students from Democracy Prep school in the South Bronx, New York, compete against young people across the US at a ‘speech’ competition at Yale University, a form of competitive acting.

programme.title: The pioneering New York prison program transforming lives | Keeping Panini alive in the digital age
programme.desc: Writing wrongs: the pioneering New York prison program transforming lives | Meet the stickerheads: the people keeping Panini alive in the digital age

programme.title: Women smash Catholic taboos in the Philippines | Fake babies, real love | Crisanto Street
programme.desc: At 11 years old, they're getting pregnant: women smash Catholic taboos in the Philippines | Fake babies, real love: the women who care for lifelike baby dolls | Crisanto Street

programme.title: Malcolm Gladwell in conversation with Ben Fountain | Stewart Lee in conversation with Alan Moore
programme.desc: Malcolm Gladwell in conversation with Ben Fountain | 'I'll write as if I'm trying to get sacked': Stewart Lee in conversation with Alan Moore

programme.title: A seven-year-old’s life in Gaza | The Ukrainian family reunited for Christmas
programme.desc: How I survive: a seven-year-old’s life in Gaza | ‘It feels like a miracle’: the Ukrainian family reunited for Christmas

programme.title: Blood, sweat and fears: special report on abuse towards grassroots football referees
programme.desc: The FA has rebooted its Respect Campaign this season to protect grassroots referees in England but many continue to suffer both mental and physical abuse.

programme.title: The coronation divides | The hidden homeless families forced to live in hotels
programme.desc: 'Your king... if you like it or not': the coronation divides | The hidden homeless families forced to live in hotels

programme.title: Silent Sam
programme.desc: Sam is a 27-year-old music-teaching, sovereign ring-wearing, chanting Buddhist. He is the lead singer of an up-and-coming punk band - but he’s also mute... at least for most of the time.

programme.title: Second innings
programme.desc: From Afghanistan to London, three boys build a new life playing cricket. Tucked away in suburban south London, matches take place every week for young and often traumatised asylum seekers.

programme.title: Working nights to pack your California strawberries, working days to graduate from school
programme.desc: Ashley Solis is a Mexican American teenager, farmworker and factory worker who dreams of being the first in her family to graduate from high school and go to college. Her mother is undocumented, and like many families with mixed documented status, they face the threat of family separation.

programme.title: Little Warrior
programme.desc: Johana Gómez, 10-time and reigning amateur featherweight boxing champion, is determined to pull herself and her family out of extreme poverty in Venezuela.

programme.title: Emergency hotline for Syrian refugee | A Syrian refugee in Scotland
programme.desc: The 24-hour emergency hotline for Syrian refugee | A Syrian refugee in Scotland: 'I'm one of the lucky ones'

programme.title: From California gang to Mexican vigilante | The final interview with a legendary journalist
programme.desc: From California gang to Mexican vigilante: the family man fighting the drug cartels in Mexico | Murdered in Mexico: the final interview with a legendary journalist

programme.title: Pitching up
programme.desc: How Ireland’s ancient sports are helping to integrate children in the country's most ethnically diverse town.

programme.title: Lives Instead of Knives: one woman's struggle to end knife crime
programme.desc: Smith's Farm Estate in Northolt, north-west London, has been the scene of multiple stabbings. After one murder came particularly close to home, community volunteer Jen Lock began a one-woman mission to end knife crime in the area. But, as she finds out, things don’t always go smoothly.

programme.title: Paris: where street basketball meets hip-hop | Mark Rothko murals at Tate Modern
programme.desc: Paris: where street basketball meets hip-hop | Waves of mysterious meaning: Mark Rothko murals at Tate Modern

programme.title: The County - what happens after police kill someone you love?
programme.desc: When someone dies after an encounter with law enforcement, he leaves behind parents and children, loss and confusion. What’s to be done when those people sworn to protect you are the same people who pull the trigger?

programme.title: The Hour of Lynching - vigilante violence in India
programme.desc: Rakbar, a Muslim dairy farmer, was murdered by a Hindu mob who thought he was taking a cow to be slaughtered for meat.

programme.title: Super Dogs | The remarkable urban photographs of David Levene
programme.desc: Super dogs: the race to win America’s most famous dog show | City: the remarkable urban photographs of David Levene

programme.title: Meet the Birdians | Darwin's lost microscope
programme.desc: Australian bird of the year 2021: Meet the 'birdians' | Darwin's lost microscope: the auction of a history-making 'box of brass'

programme.title: Juste Debout | Stik in Shoreditch
programme.desc: Juste Debout: the world's biggest street-dance competition | Stik in Shoreditch: the artist’s hidden tribute to a sold-off London

programme.title: Crossing the line
programme.desc: Episode one: Khaled's Ladder | Episode two: The story of Civil Rights is unfinished

programme.title: Canada's Music Cities
programme.desc: Canada's Music Cities

programme.title: On the Ground
programme.desc: 'I'm a Windrush baby': rebuilding a lost legacy through music | Inside the NHS at 75: ‘Used and abused, overworked and underpaid’

programme.title: The new populism
programme.desc: An investigation into the rise of a global phenomenon. How we combed leader's speeches to gauge populist rise.

programme.title: Cops and Robbers
programme.desc: Growing up in the Jamaica district of Queens in the 70s and 80s, Corey Pegues played cops and robbers like all the other kids on the block but he never expected to become both.

programme.title: Muxes
programme.desc: In Juchitán, Mexico, muxes – children identified as male at birth, but who choose at a young age to be raised as female – are embraced as part of the community.

programme.title: Inside the youth anti-abortion movement in the US | Abortion stories
programme.desc: Inside the youth anti-abortion movement in the US: 'Victory is on its way' | Abortion stories: from backstreet to legalisation

programme.title: How to See Through Fog: a portrait of a mining town in its darkest days
programme.desc: Queenstown, on the remote west coast of Tasmania, is known for two things: copper mining and the harsh gravel oval that is home to the local Australian rules football team. A series of deaths at the Mount Lyell mine brought operations to a standstill and put the future of the town in doubt.

programme.title: Dearborn, Michigan
programme.desc: In the last 12 months the city of Dearborn, Michigan, has been thrown into conflict. At its heart, the conflict is about fear, ideology and identity politics – and what it means to be an American.

programme.title: Protests in Africa's last absolute monarchy | Western Sahara: the last colony in Africa
programme.desc: The last king of Eswatini? Reporting on protests in Africa's last absolute monarchy | Western Sahara: the last colony in Africa

programme.title: Autism rocks: meet the boys from The AutistiX | What it's like to find out you’re autistic aged 33
programme.desc: Autism rocks: meet the boys from The AutistiX | What it's like to find out you’re autistic aged 33

programme.title: YouTube kids: how unboxing, gaming and toy reviews took over
programme.desc: Being a YouTuber is now the most popular aspiration for children today, according to a survey. In 2018, the site’s highest earner was a seven-year-old American toy reviewer.

programme.title: "I want to bring up a warrior": Ukraine's far-right children's camp
programme.desc: In Ukraine, the far-right Azov militia is fighting on the frontline – and running a summer camp for children.

programme.title: The story of No 20 | One man's fight to get knives off the streets of London
programme.desc: The story of No 20: how does a London family home end up empty in 2018? | One man's fight to get knives off the streets of London

programme.title: Lupita
programme.desc: In a country where indigenous people are increasingly displaced and journalists are killed at an alarming rate, a courageous new voice has emerged.

programme.title: My Brother's Keeper
programme.desc: Mohamedou Ould Salahi and one of his former guards, Steve Wood, reunite in Mauritania 13 years after last seeing each other, rekindling an unlikely relationship that profoundly changed their lives.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation.

programme.title: Today’s Top Pick
programme.desc: Documentaries in this slot are rebroadcasts of our most-viewed and most popular stories of the season. They feature important social, economic, environmental or other policy-driven issues, affecting lives nationwide or simply in one small village. A broad selection of top productions by Chinese top documentary producers.

programme.title: Humanities and Geography
programme.desc: A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.

programme.title: Living China
programme.desc: Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.

programme.title: Special Edition
programme.desc: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.

programme.title: Journeys and Discoveries
programme.desc: A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.

programme.title: History in the Frame
programme.desc: A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.

programme.title: Best Eats
programme.desc: Food connects people! A feast for the eyes that spotlights the cuisines of China in a way that’s bound to set the mouths of the whole globe watering!

programme.title: Youthful China
programme.desc: The youth of a country is the future of that country. A series of documentaries focusing on the younger generation of China in which you get to see what they are achieving and what makes them tick!

programme.title: Pixel Collage
programme.desc: A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Squizzy pomaga początkującemu Bryce'owi. Cracker i Scotty przez sześć dni narażają życie łowiąc z małej łódki. Jay realizuje szybkie zamówienie na 250 kilogramów homarów.

programme.title: Z samolotu do sieci
programme.desc: Największym koszmarem każdego pilota i pasażera jest sytuacja, w której zawodzi sam samolot. Choć każda część jest wielokrotnie sprawdzana, nie da się całkowicie wyeliminować ryzyka awarii.

programme.title: Drwale z Kolumbii Brytyjskiej
programme.desc: Craig LeBeau i jego ekipa rozbijają obóz w odległej części Shuswap Highlands. Tymczasem Brent oczyszcza drogę dla skuterów śnieżnych na zlecenie lokalnego ośrodka narciarskiego.

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Scrappers są już w połowie drogi do zrealizowania swojego celu — ale mają duże wydatki. Gold Gypsies są zdeterminowani, aby wydobyć ostatnie 30 uncji złota. Mahoneyowie wracają na starą działkę.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Pomiędzy Turbo a jego domem znajduje się ostatni, trudny odcinek drogi — równina Nullabor. Ewan przewozi 30 milionów pszczół, a Christian dociera do rzeki Goyder.

programme.title: Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem Ep4
programme.desc: Ash obozuje obok odcinka Qin Wielkiego Muru, czeka na wschód słońca, siłuje się z mistrzem Mongolii Wewnętrznej, uczy się od eksperta technik przetrwania na pustyni i szuka zaginionego miasta.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Squizzy pomaga początkującemu Bryce'owi. Cracker i Scotty przez sześć dni narażają życie łowiąc z małej łódki. Jay realizuje szybkie zamówienie na 250 kilogramów homarów.

programme.title: Z samolotu do sieci
programme.desc: Największym koszmarem każdego pilota i pasażera jest sytuacja, w której zawodzi sam samolot. Choć każda część jest wielokrotnie sprawdzana, nie da się całkowicie wyeliminować ryzyka awarii.

programme.title: Drwale z Kolumbii Brytyjskiej
programme.desc: Craig LeBeau i jego ekipa rozbijają obóz w odległej części Shuswap Highlands. Tymczasem Brent oczyszcza drogę dla skuterów śnieżnych na zlecenie lokalnego ośrodka narciarskiego.

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Scrappers są już w połowie drogi do zrealizowania swojego celu — ale mają duże wydatki. Gold Gypsies są zdeterminowani, aby wydobyć ostatnie 30 uncji złota. Mahoneyowie wracają na starą działkę.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Pomiędzy Turbo a jego domem znajduje się ostatni, trudny odcinek drogi — równina Nullabor. Ewan przewozi 30 milionów pszczół, a Christian dociera do rzeki Goyder.

programme.title: Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem Ep4
programme.desc: Ash obozuje obok odcinka Qin Wielkiego Muru, czeka na wschód słońca, siłuje się z mistrzem Mongolii Wewnętrznej, uczy się od eksperta technik przetrwania na pustyni i szuka zaginionego miasta.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Squizzy pomaga początkującemu Bryce'owi. Cracker i Scotty przez sześć dni narażają życie łowiąc z małej łódki. Jay realizuje szybkie zamówienie na 250 kilogramów homarów.

programme.title: Drwale z Kolumbii Brytyjskiej
programme.desc: Napięcie rośnie, kiedy Craig i Taylor próbują przenieść 65-tonową wyciągarkę. Gloverowie zmieniają miejsce na górze Erie Mountain w regionie Salmo.

programme.title: Z samolotu do sieci
programme.desc: W powietrzu jest dziś na raz więcej samolotów niż kiedykolwiek wcześniej. Piloci pracują pod ogromną presją, chcąc przetransportować pasażerów na miejsce bezpiecznie i na czas.

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Plan ekipy Dirt Dogs — złoto za milion dolarów — wydaje się nieosiągalny. Mahoneyom do osiągnięcia celu brakuje złota za 22 tys. dolarów. Rick jest blisko sukcesu, ale końcówka jest bardzo trudna.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Steve przygotowuje się do kolejnej misji. Yogi szykuje się do trasy w poprzek kontynentu. Russell desperacko chce nadrobić stracony czas i pieniądze po tym, jak infekcja płuc pozbawiła go pracy.

programme.title: Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem Ep5
programme.desc: Ash udaje się na wędrówkę o wschodzie słońca w góry Helan, aby dotrzeć do starożytnej części Wielkiego Muru zwanej Guidegou Ming. Podziwia nowo odkrytą część muru i pływa w rzece Huang He.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S3 Ep5
programme.desc: To wyjtkowo trudny czas dla caej floty. Kuter William Norling jest na morzu ju od tygodnia, a jego kapitan Danny nadal nie znalaz kupca na 1000 kilogramw homarw.

programme.title: Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem Ep2
programme.desc: Ash przebywa na wsi w pobliżu Pekinu, gdzie poznaje metody ochrony dzikiej przyrody; udaje się także do wioski Shixia, odgrywającej ważną rolę w ochronę dwóch odcinków Wielkiego Muru.

programme.title: Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem Ep3
programme.desc: Ash bada jeden z najstarszych odcinków Wielkiego Muru w Zhangjiakou, budowany przez osiem kolejnych dynastii. Podąża także śladami starożytnych odkrywców.

programme.title: Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem Ep4
programme.desc: Ash obozuje obok odcinka Qin Wielkiego Muru, czeka na wschód słońca, siłuje się z mistrzem Mongolii Wewnętrznej, uczy się od eksperta technik przetrwania na pustyni i szuka zaginionego miasta.

programme.title: Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem Ep5
programme.desc: Ash udaje się na wędrówkę o wschodzie słońca w góry Helan, aby dotrzeć do starożytnej części Wielkiego Muru zwanej Guidegou Ming. Podziwia nowo odkrytą część muru i pływa w rzece Huang He.

programme.title: Katastrofy w przestworzach
programme.desc: W porwanym samolocie Ethiopian Airlines 767 w pobliżu Komorów kończy się paliwo. Maszyna spada z wysokości 10 kilometrów: tylko umiejętności pilota mogą uratować życie osób na pokładzie.

programme.title: Dlaczego znikają samoloty: zagadka lotu MH370
programme.desc: Samolot linii Malaysia Airlines — lot MH370 — zniknął 8 marca 2014 r. z 239 pasażerami i członkami załogi na pokładzie. Czy nowa technologia radiowa mogłaby pomóc w odnalezieniu zaginionej maszyny?

programme.title: Statek za miliard funtów
programme.desc: Zespół znakomitych inżynierów ściga się z czasem, budując jeden z największych i najbardziej zaawansowanych technologicznie statków wycieczkowych na świecie.

programme.title: Z samolotu do sieci
programme.desc: Największym koszmarem każdego pilota i pasażera jest sytuacja, w której zawodzi sam samolot. Choć każda część jest wielokrotnie sprawdzana, nie da się całkowicie wyeliminować ryzyka awarii.

programme.title: Z samolotu do sieci
programme.desc: W powietrzu jest dziś na raz więcej samolotów niż kiedykolwiek wcześniej. Piloci pracują pod ogromną presją, chcąc przetransportować pasażerów na miejsce bezpiecznie i na czas.

programme.title: Drwale z Kolumbii Brytyjskiej
programme.desc: Odwilż wczesną wiosną sprawia, że projekt budowy drogi staje się dla Brenta i Taylora bitwą z błotem. Szef otrzymuje nieoczekiwaną wiadomość, która może zagrozić całej jego działalności.

programme.title: Drwale z Kolumbii Brytyjskiej
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Może tak, może nie
programme.desc: Pogoda mocno daje się we znaki załodze i sprzętowi; kolejne awarie sprawiają, że Taylor dochodzi do granicy wytrzymałości, co zmusza go do konfrontacji z szefem.

programme.title: Drwale z Kolumbii Brytyjskiej
programme.desc: Flota braci LeBeau walczy z błotnistymi, zapadającymi się drogami, aby zwieźć z góry ostatnie pnie. Craig wpada w tarapaty — jego załoga rusza, aby wydostać go z dymiącej maszyny.

programme.title: Drwale z Kolumbii Brytyjskiej
programme.desc: Craig LeBeau i jego ekipa rozbijają obóz w odległej części Shuswap Highlands. Tymczasem Brent oczyszcza drogę dla skuterów śnieżnych na zlecenie lokalnego ośrodka narciarskiego.

programme.title: Drwale z Kolumbii Brytyjskiej
programme.desc: Napięcie rośnie, kiedy Craig i Taylor próbują przenieść 65-tonową wyciągarkę. Gloverowie zmieniają miejsce na górze Erie Mountain w regionie Salmo.

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Instalacja ekipy Dirt Dogs zostaje uszkodzona — a jej wykorzystanie ma kluczowe znaczenie dla realizacji celów. Rick potrzebuje już tylko 4 uncji złota. Konkurencja Mahoneyów nie ma żadnych skrupułów.

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Ekipa Scrappers robi, co może, aby utrzymać swoją instalację na chodzie i wydobywać złoto. Rick walczy z potwornym upałem. Greg wyrusza na drugi koniec Australii, aby czuwać przy chorym ojcu.

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Gold Gypsies znajdują się w krytycznym punkcie, kiedy orientują się, że ktoś kradnie im złoto. Scrappers potrzebują jeszcze 62 uncji. Rod i Eric próbują naprawić zepsuty taśmociąg.

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Scrappers są już w połowie drogi do zrealizowania swojego celu — ale mają duże wydatki. Gold Gypsies są zdeterminowani, aby wydobyć ostatnie 30 uncji złota. Mahoneyowie wracają na starą działkę.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Koszmar Russella McDonougha trwa. Yogi spędza trochę czasu z rodziną, ale czekają go trudne chwile. Joey Granich ryzykuje życiem, walcząc ze stadem wściekłych byków.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Dennis Dent, weteran bitych dróg, staje oko w oko ze swoją nemezis. Christian Reynolds wyrusza w dzicz z ważną misją, mającą umożliwić zbudowanie mostu. Turbo usiłuje rozwiązywać kolejne problemy.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Dennis szykuje się do bitwy ze starym przeciwnikiem — drogą na przylądek York. Christian modli się, aby pora deszczowa wreszcie się skończyła. Turbo jest już w Perth i chce zobaczyć się z rodziną.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S2 Ep12
programme.desc: Pomiędzy Turbo a jego domem znajduje się ostatni, trudny odcinek drogi — równina Nullabor. Ewan przewozi 30 milionów pszczół, a Christian dociera do rzeki Goyder.

programme.desc: Steve przygotowuje się do kolejnej misji. Yogi szykuje się do trasy w poprzek kontynentu. Russell desperacko chce nadrobić stracony czas i pieniądze po tym, jak infekcja płuc pozbawiła go pracy.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Ceny krabów załamały się z powodu światowej pandemii. Dochody Squizzy'ego spadły o 150 tys. dolarów. Cracker znajduje kupca, ale Jay i jego siostrzeńcy od siedmiu tygodni nie dostają wypłaty.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Światowy rynek przeżywa załamanie, poławiacze homarów w całym kraju mają poważne trudności. Trudne czasy wymagają radykalnych posunięć: jak sprzedawać homary na lokalnym rynku pogrążonym w kryzysie?

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Połowy homarów trwają. Poczatkujący kapitan Bryce wypływa w swój dziewiczy rejs, który okazuje się pasmem koszmarów. Cracker ma dostać 50 tys. dolarów za tonę homarów — ale czy mu się to uda?

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Captured: Extreme Weather | Super El Niño
programme.desc: El Niño is a temperature anomaly in the Pacific Ocean that affects weather patterns around the globe. In this episode we show some of the costly and deadly weather that can result when a Super El Niño occurs.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Captured: Extreme Weather | Sudden Danger
programme.desc: In these viral videos we witness how, in the blink of an eye, your day can become suddenly dangerous. Even on a beautiful day, when you're not expecting any severe weather at all, Mother Nature can sometimes be malicious and sneaky

programme.title: Viral Wild
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 WS Viral Wild | Ep. 2.9
programme.desc: Become one with primates and explore their mischiefs with these wild encounters.

programme.title: Viral Wild
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 WS Viral Wild | Ep. 3.1
programme.desc: Tag along with these good samaritans on some of the most heart-pounding animal rescues.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Storm Hunters | Nature's Fury
programme.desc: Jaclyn joins Mark in a ride through the US Midwest during the most prolific tornado season on record.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Storm Hunters | Perilous Pursuit
programme.desc: Destructive tornadoes and ferocious winds are only two elements Mark and Jaclyn encounter when storm hunting.

programme.title: Hellfire Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Hellfire Heroes | Trial By Fire

programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots | Surf's Up
programme.desc: Rough seas have a couple of surfers turning to Island Air for an adventure of a life time.

programme.title: Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots | On Thin Ice
programme.desc: On a rare day off, Josiah and his friends white water raft where few have gone before - on top of the massive Knik Glacier.

programme.title: Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Alaska's Ultimate Bush Pilots | Meet Island Air
programme.desc: Alaskan bush pilots risk everything to save hunters struggling to stay alive in a remote area of Kodiak.

programme.title: Fight to Survive
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Fight To Survive | Under the Desert Sun
programme.desc: Ed Rosenthal set out for a short hike in Joshua Tree National Park, but in the heat of the day he became turned around and lost. His six-day ordeal of survival in blazing temperatures with no food or water is nothing short of miraculous.

programme.title: Fight to Survive
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Fight To Survive | Stranded in the Alaska Wilderness Part 1
programme.desc: Hunters Adrian Knopps and Garrett Hagen venture into the remotest part of Alaska's Misty Fjord, hunting Moose and Bear. After a successful hunt Adrian finds himself trapped by a twenty foot tidal surge after Garrett fails to return with the skiff.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Captured: Extreme Weather | Super El Niño
programme.desc: El Niño is a temperature anomaly in the Pacific Ocean that affects weather patterns around the globe. In this episode we show some of the costly and deadly weather that can result when a Super El Niño occurs.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Captured: Extreme Weather | Sudden Danger
programme.desc: In these viral videos we witness how, in the blink of an eye, your day can become suddenly dangerous. Even on a beautiful day, when you're not expecting any severe weather at all, Mother Nature can sometimes be malicious and sneaky

programme.title: Viral Wild
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 WS Viral Wild | Ep. 3.2
programme.desc: Oh, deer! Make room for the deer crossing as these wild woodland creatures take over...your TV.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Storm Hunters | Shear Strength
programme.desc: On his home turf in Canada, Mark and his team chase one of nature’s deadliest forces, coming face to face with tornadoes’ shear strength.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Storm Hunters | True North Strong
programme.desc: Canada’s weather is complex and powerful! Mark and fellow storm hunters chase down avalanches in British Columbia’s back country, twisters in Saskatchewan, and hurricane scale storms in Newfoundland. Enduring extreme weather is just an ordinary day for the True North Strong.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: The “Angry Planet” team will be tracking storms through the 2009 Hurricane season, and plan to film george as he heads into a big one.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Angry Planet | Fire and Water
programme.desc: With summer wildfires overpowering the Yukon forests, host/adventurer George Kourounis follows the fabled route of the Klondike Gold Rush sourdoughs through the bawdy town of Skagway, Alaska, paddling the white water rivers and the White Horse Rapids into the Yukon. He travels on mountain bike, steam train and Cessna to experience the huge fires and meet the northern fire crews battling the blazes.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Angry Planet | Desert Monsoon
programme.desc: Host/adventurer George Kourounis explores the American Southwest during the Desert Monsoon. He ups the danger factor by traveling with wild atheist shock-jock R.J. Evans to track massive lightning storms which can produce bolts of up to one hundred million volts. The pair come close - too close - to dangerous electrical clouds swirling over Tucson, Sedona and Monument Valley.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Angry Planet | Crystal Cave
programme.desc: In 2000, a remarkable find was made in Chihuahua, Mexico, of a spectacular cave filled with giant crystals, some over 20 meters long. But it is a intensely difficult spot to explore – with temperatures over 50 degrees C and humidity well over 100%. George leads an Explorers Club Flag Expedition into the cave, wearing special refrigerated suits and respirators to battle the extreme environment.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Angry Planet | African Hellhole
programme.desc: The Angry Planet team heads to Africa to climb the steep and very active Nyiragongo Volcano in the Congo that erupted in 2002, sending 125,000 people fleeing for their lives. Host/adventurer George Kourounis explores the bubbling lake of molten lava and investigates the risk the dangerous volcano poses to both the people of city of Goma and the Mountain Gorillas who live on the nearby jungle slopes.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: For George Kourounis‚ ground zero for stormchasing is Oklahoma City, the capital of´Tornado Alley´.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Angry Planet | The Winds of Autumn
programme.desc: The autumn of 2006 brings hurricanes to the North Atlantic and hot dry winds fan forest fires across Northern Ontario. Host/adventurer George Kourounis has traveled to some awesome hurricanes, including Rita and Katrina, with his pal Mark Robinson. This year they stormchase in Newfoundland, site of the hurricane that pulled Mark out of a life-threatening depression.

programme.title: Angry Planet
programme.desc: The “Angry Planet” team hopes to film the natural wonders and extreme phenomena of this fascinating Central Asian country, including a spectacularly burning crater of natural gas, underground lakes, sandstorms and remnants of the dinosaurs.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 WS Viral Wild | Ep. 2.10

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Extreme Weather Countdown | Dust Devils in the Wind
programme.desc: Weather is an unrelenting force, tearing through our lives and homes, with no regard for the human condition. But lucky for us, these humans have been conditioned to take out their phones and record whatever is happening, letting us relive the experiences again and again. And when it comes to weather that is out of the ordinary, that's truly where we come alive. Strap in, because you're about to get hit by an Extreme Weather Countdown.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Extreme Weather Countdown | It's Raining Cats & Dogs & Boats
programme.desc: Mother Nature is back and ready to blow you away, with some of the fiercest, most electrifying, and most extreme weather we have ever seen! So buckle in and let’s get ready to ride!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Extreme Weather Countdown | Throwing Porta Potties to the Wind
programme.desc: The world is a dangerous place, and with wild weather occurances happening every 20 seconds, it's no wonder we never have a shortage of footage to showcase here. The videos we have gathered are guarenteed to blow you away, so let's not waste anymore time and jump right into it.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Extreme Weather Countdown | The Tip of the Ice Storm
programme.desc: When the weather gets rough, the brave start recording. From raging hurricanes to devastating dust storms, it's time to watch as we showcase some of the wildest weather ever caught on film. It's time for Extreme Weather Countdown!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Extreme Weather Countdown | Darkest Before the Storm
programme.desc: Mother Nature is back and ready to show you just how powerful she can be!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Extreme Weather Countdown | It's All Downfall from Here
programme.desc: The countdown has begun as we prepare for some of the most extreme weather caught on camera!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Extreme Weather Countdown | What the Hail?
programme.desc: Brace yourself for unpredictable dust devils, mind blowing lightning shows, and glass shattering hail storms!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Extreme Weather Countdown | 1000 Lawn Chairs in the Wind
programme.desc: It doesn't matter that there are over a 1000 tornados or millions of thunderstorms take place all over the world every year; someone is always going to be there to capture it and when they do, you know that we are going to show it to you!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Extreme Weather Countdown | When It Rains It Pours
programme.desc: Welcome to Extreme Weather Countdown, where lightning can strike and the earth can quake all in one episode!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Extreme Weather Countdown | My Trashcan is Gone with the Wind
programme.desc: Get ready, because it's time once again to watch some of the wildest weather videos you've ever seen! From thunderstorms to tornadoes, hail to flooding, we've got it all

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Extreme Weather Countdown | Raindrops Keep Falling On My Head
programme.desc: Buckle up, folks, because we're headed straight into the eye of the hurricane, the mouth of the volcano, and the depths of the flood, and we're doing it all right here, on another episode of Extreme Weather Countdown!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Extreme Weather Countdown | Come Rain or High Water
programme.desc: Just when you thought it was safe to go back outside, we've go a brand new episode to change your mind! Brace yourselves, because we're about to head into frenzy once again! From twisty tornados to scary storms, we've got them all.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Extreme Weather Countdown | The One Where Lightning Strikes Twice
programme.desc: From Florida's shores to Australia's outback, we traveled the world to collect videos that will blow you away.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Extreme Weather Countdown | Come Hell or High Winds
programme.desc: Stop me if you heard this one before? What's fast, windy, and can ruin your day in seconds? Of course, we're talking about the weather. And over the next half hour, we'll be bringing you some of the craziest moments ever captured on camera; from hailstorms to tornados and everything in between, we're going to show it all, right here on Extreme Weather Countdown.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Extreme Weather Countdown | The Cold Never Bothered Me Anyway
programme.desc: Are you ready for some electricyfing weather videos? Because we've got it all...wind storms, flashfloods, and even hurricanes! We've pulled together some of the craziest weather you've ever seen!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Extreme Weather Countdown | Let It Snow, Let It Snow, Let It Snow
programme.desc: Today's forecast is a doozy! Wind, followed by hail, and then with a bit of a hurricane for good measure.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 Extreme Weather Countdown | Expect the Unexpected
programme.desc: You’re in for some wild, wild weather today as tumbleweeds, snow, and lightning all pile up!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 Extreme Weather Countdown | Rain, Rain, Go Away!
programme.desc: Rainstorms cause mudslides, landslides, floods, and more on this wet episode of Extreme Weather Countdown

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 Extreme Weather Countdown | Storms for the Record Books
programme.desc: Record setting snowfall, tidal waves, rainfall, and flooding all make history in this noteworthy countdown.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Extreme Weather Countdown | Timber!
programme.desc: Things heat up with sweltering heat waves, then cool down with icy blizzards on Extreme Weather Countdown!

programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Extreme Weather Countdown | Cold as Ice

programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Extreme Weather Countdown | Slip and Slide
